Как бы сказать, чтоб никого не обидеть?.. Фантастический шутер. К моменту выхода HalfLife 2 я успел пройти Deus Ex, Unreal, Unreal Mission Pack: Return to Na Pali и Unreal II: The Awakening, которые были значительно лучше. Конечно, уровень графики перечисленных игр (кроме Unreal II: The Awakening) был гораздо ниже, но сюжет и геймплей были несравненно лучше. Поэтому и не зацепил меня как-то по-особенному Half-Life 2. Кстати, при сравнительно открытом мире игры очень нервировали заскриптованные враги.

Half-Life 2 è semplicemente uno dei migliori FPS per PC, il primo capitolo ha fatto la storia, ma questo capitolo è di gran lunga superiore al predecessore a mio parere. Dopo l'incidente a Black Mesa del primo capitolo, si rivestiranno i panni del Doc Gordon Freeman, intento a eliminare le forze Combine assieme alla resistenza di City 17.

La particolarità di questo gioco, oltre che il classico metodo dei videogiochi di una volta, che più si proseguirà e più diventerà difficile, è il fatto che la telecamera non andrà mai a vedere Freeman, quindi non ci saranno cutscene, facendo coinvolgere e immedesimare il giocatore con il protagonista perfettamente.

"L'uomo giusto nel posto sbagliato può fare la differenza in questo mondo.."

PRO:
-Storia molto originale con molti colpi di scena
-Coinvolgente per il fatto che il protagonista non parla mai per tutto il gioco
-Pur avendo un motore grafico vecchio, la grafica è molto buona
-Momenti molto d'azione, con livelli davvero impegnativi 
-Personaggi ben caratterizzati e le armi sono ben bilanciate

CONTRO:
-Nel transito di vari livelli ci sono troppi caricamenti
-I momenti dei puzzle rallentano il gioco che prima poteva essere frenetico
-I troppi fags che aspettano il terzo capitolo senza sapere com'è il secondo.
-"SI SVEGLHI SEGNOR FREEMAN, SE SVEGLHIII" -G-Man in Italiano.

Voto: 9.5
Los gráficos han envejecido genial, la historia es absorbente y la jugabilidad está muy cuidada.En definitiva,obligatorio. 10/10

Это прекрасная, интересная, захватывающая история о Гордоне Фримене. Конечно большинство времени игрок проводит в одиночестве, но в этом есть свои плюсы например: никто постоянно не болтает под руку. Я прошол её полностью где-то за неделю и остался доволен, конечно местами было сложно, скучно, одиноко но мне всё это понравилось. Несмотря на то, что некоторые пользователи, её непрошедшие, говорят, что она убога - это не так. Это старая игра навсегда заняла место в моём сердечке, опередив многие новинки-пустышки. Ну а сейчас включён режим перманентного ожидания третьей части.

Приятной игры!

It was great. A solid 10 hours of creative gameplay. On top of a solid set of shooting mechanics, there is an amazing physics system to allow for satisfying puzzles and silly improvised weapons/cover.

The game is easy to pick up, no walls of text or long tutorials. All game mechanics are taught through intuitive level design and small bits of dialouge from NPCs.

I dont like doing "serious reviews"..
But Half Life 2 is a game to be taken seriously.

-When you think about it the in-game mechanics were amazinly good for the time it was released, and are still loads off fun in present time.

-The graphics are fluid and still look great to this day.

-The weaponry is loads of fun!

-And the horror aspect is startling.
This is one of those games where after you kill your enemy you shoot him a few more times to make sure hes dead!

-And on top of all that, you can have such a great game for a cheap price!

..Oh and apparently the storyline or something is pretty good...

Amazing story, repetetive at times but extremely fun gameplay. The achievments are enough replay value for me, and sometimes I'll try to replay the game only using one weapon (the shotgun is fun to use). Unlike most shooters, this game forces you to be aware of your surroundings and environment, and gives you the power to manipulate this environment in your favor. Sure, you could just kill every enemy with countless bullets, but the fun truly lies in the usage of what is given to you besides bullets. There are cases where not shooting enemies, but instead manipulating the environment, is often the most efficient way to get through the game, and is also the most fun.

Half Life 2 is by far one of the most highest rated PC exclusives of all time (not including Deus Ex: Original). This game offers an amazing storyline with heart beating and fast paced adventure as Gordon Freeman returns in this series after the incident in Black Mesa, facing himself against the empire of combines that await in this game. If you plan on buying this, try finishing it as soon as possible. When you finish Half Life 2, you may also be part of the Half Life 3 wait (which will probably never come out so pray to Gabe Newell).

Half-Life 2, what more can i say about the game? The source engine has definately a big effect on this game compared to Half-Life 1, graphical wise it is a beautiful game with many realistic textures. The storyline is again so unique and tends to put ideas into the players mind to make up their own story as many aspects are still vague but enough to lead on. Reccommend this one for those who are thinking about playing Half-Life or into Sci-fi shooters. The squad Ai is definately different and at times extremely annoying as they are in your way of fire or movement, that was really the only issue to be pointed out.
Kocham tą gre

Als nicht Spieler des ersten Teils- ok habe den nur angetestet
ist Half life 2 nicht wirklich logisch was die Handlung angeht.
Visuell mag das Spiel damals begeistert haben.
Spielerisch ist es in meinen Augen immer noch sehr herausfordernt, speziell wenn man es auf schwer spielt.
Die beklemmende Athmosphäre am anfang ist gut insziniert.
Die Gegner teils doch sehr brachial und unfair gesetzt. Trotzdem im gesammten ersten drittel des Spiels wird man also gejagd und da es vor allem ein Ballerspiel ist mit alien wesen und Wachen wird hier auch sehr abwechslungsreich mit einigem Waffenarsenal virtuell geschossen. 
Einen dicken Minuspunkt vergebe ich für die viel zu lange Verfolgungsleveltour mit dem Hoverboot und dem Helikopter.
Das hat mich persönlich echt frustriert und am ende gelangweilt.
Ob sich das Spiel abhebt vom heutigen oder damaligen Shooter Rest?
Ja es hat ziemlich viele gute Ideen und auf der Karte findet man jede Menge versteckte Dinge.
Die Physik engine ist auch gut für damalige Verhältnisse etwas besonderes.
Ich persönlich spielte zu dem Zeitpunkt lieber Unreal kann aber auch von  Half Life bzw Half life 2 begeistert sein.
Die Story ist wie gesagt gut insziniert. Die späteren Level mit dem Verseuchten Dorf und was da alles kommt ist
spaßig und verleitet die Gravity Gun zu allem möglichen als Fluggeschoß den Gegnern an die Birne zu schlagen.
Da es sich hier um eine Cut Version handelt und ich allgemein nicht viel von Cut halte, bin ich da auch nicht ganz so begeistert. Aber man merkt es dem Spiel nicht sonderlich an.
Aus dem Entwicklerstandpunkt betrachtet hat Valve einen sehr guten Job gemacht, so spielt sich das Spiel auf 
High end Rechnern mit ultra Einstellungen, wenn es sowas überhaupt damals gab wirklich gut.
Bugs gab es hier und da ein paar zu sehen. 
Auf jeden Fall war es ähnlich wie Unreal sehr innovativ und heutige Spielehersteller könnten sich doch gern wieder
diesem Verhalten eine große Scheibe von abschneiden.
Ein Paar Level, wie gesagt die Flucht mit dem Boot sind sehr schlauchig.
Grafisch wirkt das Spiel heute natürlich etwas sehr kantig.

(FR) Je n'avais jamais joué à Half Life 1 quand j'ai commencé celui ci il y a quelques jours . Et malgré mon manque de compréhension du scénario, surtout lorsque j'ai été confronté au mystérieux G-Man, j'ai vraiment aimé !
Le jeu mérite tous les éloges qu'il a reçu, il est magnifique, autant pour ses graphismes que par sa bande son .
Le gameplay est correct (celui d'un shooter classique) et facile à prendre en main . Les décors comme les pnj sont travaillés .  Bref, ce jeu est une tuerie .
(spoilers )  
Le seul point négatif, c'est que je ne trouve pas le personnage de Gordon Freeman attachant du tout . Il tue pratiquement tout le monde et ne ressent aucune émotion, même après avoir exterminé une garnison complète de soldats du Cartel . Il ne peut pas dialoguer du tout et se contente d'obéir aux ordres d'Alix entre autres . Et j'aimerais aussi ajouter, pour finir, que le personnage de G-Man n'est pas assez expliqué et que beaucoup de ses citations m'échappent totalement . J'ai donc été beaucoup déçu par la fin : je m'attendais à voir la ville de Cité 17 quelques années plus tard : totalement reconstruite , les citoyens vivant en Paix et les Soldats du Cartel tous neutralisés et pas un G-Man arrêtant le temps  pour me sortir une phrase énigmatique et voir les crédits arriver ...

Bref, mis à part ces quelques déceptions, le jeu est génial . Je vous le conseille donc, foncez dessus vous ne le regretterez pas !

Every gamer should play this revolutionary and refining title. One of the best single-player experiences ever crafted. No cutscenes, no skipping, if it was any more cohesive you'd get sucked into your computer screen.

Őszinte leszek, mostanáig kimaradt a Half Life az életemből és a mai napig nem tudom, hogy ennek mi az oka, de végre sikerült pótolnom eme hiányosságomat és kezem közé kaparintottam a második részt. Rögtön magával ragadott a játék hangulata és világa, az egészről süt egyfajta orwelli disztópia (a Steamen látható trailer is olyan, mintha Alyxet belerakták volna az 1984 c. film egyik jelenetébe). A játékmenet kellően változatos, a sztori is remek, a zene is, egyszóval nagyon nehezen tudok bármibe is belekötni. A lényeg a lényeg, hogy a HL2 a sztoriközpontú FPS-ek egyik koronázatlan királya és buta vagy, ha kihagyod.

I recommend this game because the truth is I did enjoy some parts and overall the adventure is nice. Plus at the time it came out it did some revolutionary things. But this is quite possibly the most overrated game of the 21st century, and it has not aged well. The game gets very reptitive and you will get bored, especially if you sit down to play it for long periods of time. Even the story, the sole thing that ends up motivating you to push through all the uninteresting gunfights and physics-puzzles, starts wearing thin as the characters keeping giving these passionate responses to an emotional retard who has no real personality.

I'm still recommending it, but don't go in expecting the greatest game of all time or anything like that.

I wanted to give a positive review but unfortunately I can't. I've been trying to play Half-Life 2 but this game causes a severe kind of motion sickness and from searching the web it looks like I'm not alone. And I'm not even prone to get motion sickness, I've only experienced this in Portal 1 and now Half-Life 2. Portal 1 gave me a mild headache, but nothing that prevented me from playing (and Portal 2 didn't make me sick at all). Half-Life 2 it's much worse than that, just 10 minutes of gaming makes me really indisposed, it's unbearable! And it takes a lot of time to fully recover. I tried changing vertical sync and FOV settings like some people recommended but the problem remains. Be aware of this problem if you want to buy and play the game.

This game feels like Half Life 1's "special" little brother that stays under-developed and below expectations for the rest of his life.
Couldn't really get into this game, I don't know what they were trying to do with it but they should of just stuck to what they know. Half Life was amazing.
This tries to mess with an open-worldy type feel, in terms of, "This is a big space, yes explore, but don't go that way, or that way." And the vehicle movements are so cringe-worthy they're instantly frustrating.
Graphics and texture wise, the older game is definatley ontop and has aged well. This "new" feel just isn't working out, doubt they'll be a number 3 though? ;)
On the plus side, the gravity gun is cool, but I don't buy game to be able to drag boxes around.
**THE NOISE OF THE CROWBAR ANNOYED ME THE MOST. I MISS THE SATISFYING "DUNGGGG DUNGGG" IT MADE WHEN YOU HIT A WALL, BUT THIS IS NO MORE.**
ALSO, THE HAZARD SUIT IS NOW TERRIBLE. GONE IS THE SLEEK ORANGE ATTIRE WHICH HAS BEEN "UPDATED." IT'S WORSE.

One of the few games to stand the test of time, Half-Life 2 takes science fiction to the next level and in its own way, has defined the theme for years to come. The story takes place "shortly" after the events of Black Mesa, where Gordan Freeman is called upon by the G-Man to make things right in a world of masked alien police who knock over soda cans and want you to throw them away. 10/10
